targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug distribution in major versions
with bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,'refs/tags/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) as repo_id,
		i.key, i.type, i.title, i.summary
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		-- and i.type = 'BUG'
)


SELECT 
	concat(SUBSTRING_INDEX(biet.tag_name,'.',2), '.x') as major_version,
	count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
GROUP BY 1

-- Get the number of fixed bugs in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
),

_bugs_of_tags as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,'refs/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) as repo_id,
		count(*) as bug_count
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rid.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
	GROUP BY 1,2
),

_dev_eq_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,'refs/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,':', 3) as repo_id,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    sum(c.dev_eq) as dev_eq
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join pull_requests pr on c.sha = pr.merge_commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rcd.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
	group by 1,2,3
),

_pr_worktype as(
  select
    distinct pri.pull_request_id,i.type
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    issue_number != 0
),

_pr_elco_and_worktype as(
  select
    deop.tag_name, 
    sum(case when pw.type = 'BUG' then dev_eq else 0 end)/sum(dev_eq) as rework_cost_percentage
  from 
    _dev_eq_of_pr deop
    left join _pr_worktype pw on deop.pull_request_id = pw.pull_request_id
  GROUP BY 1
)

SELECT 
	bot.tag_name,
	bot.bug_count,
	peaw.rework_cost_percentage
FROM 
	_bugs_of_tags bot
	join _pr_elco_and_worktype peaw on bot.tag_name = peaw.tag_name
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: 2. Bug fixed count and rework cost percentage in the last 10 tags

targets.rawSql:
-- Component distribution of bugs fixed in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
),

bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,'refs/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) as repo_id,
		i.key, i.component, i.severity, i.title, i.summary
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rid.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)


SELECT
	case when component = '' then 'unlabeled' else 'labeled' end as component,
	count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: 3.1 Component distribution of bugs fixed in the last 10 tags

targets.rawSql:
-- Component distribution of bugs fixed in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
),

bugs_in_each_tag as(
	select 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,'refs/', -1) as tag_name, 
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) as repo_id,
		i.key, i.component, i.severity, i.title, i.summary
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rid.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
)


SELECT
	component,
	count(*) as bug_count
FROM 
	bugs_in_each_tag biet
where 
  component != ''
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: 3.2 Component distribution of bugs fixed in the last 10 tags

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug fixer distribution in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
),

_bugs as(
	select 
		i.key, i.type, i.severity, i.title, i.summary,
		pr.id, pr.author_name as pr_author, pr.created_date,
		rank() over(partition by i.id order by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
		left join pull_request_issues pri on i.id = pri.issue_id
		left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rid.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
	order by i.key
),

_bug_fixed_count as(
  SELECT 
    pr_author,
    count(*) bug_fixed_count
  FROM _bugs
  WHERE pr_rank = 1
  GROUP BY 1
),

_bug_fixed_count_running_total as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    sum(bug_fixed_count) OVER (Order by bug_fixed_count desc) AS running_total
  FROM 
    _bug_fixed_count
),

_percentile as(
  SELECT 
    pr_author,
    bug_fixed_count,
    running_total/sum(bug_fixed_count) OVER () AS cumulative_percentage
  FROM 
    _bug_fixed_count_running_total
)


SELECT 
  count(case when cumulative_percentage <= 0.8 then pr_author else null end)/count(*) as "% of contributors who fixed 80% of the bugs"
FROM _percentile

panels.title: 4.1 % of contributors who fixed 80% of bugs in the last 10 tags

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug fixer distribution in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
),

_bugs as(
	select 
		i.key, i.type, i.severity, i.title, i.summary,
		pr.id, pr.author_name as pr_author, pr.created_date,
		rank() over(partition by i.id order by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
		left join pull_request_issues pri on i.id = pri.issue_id
		left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rid.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
	order by i.key
)

SELECT 
  pr_author,
  count(*) bug_fixed_count
FROM _bugs
WHERE pr_rank = 1
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 desc
limit 15

panels.title: 4.2 Top 15 contributors in bug-fixing in the last 10 tags

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the avg bug age in history
select 
  avg(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as average_bug_age
from issues
where 
  type = 'BUG'
  and status = 'DONE'

-- Get the bug fixer distribution in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
),

_bugs as(
	select distinct
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,'refs/', -1) as tag_name,
		i.id,
		i.lead_time_minutes
	from
		refs_issues_diffs rid
		left join issues i on rid.issue_id = i.id
		left join pull_request_issues pri on i.id = pri.issue_id
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rid.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rid.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
		and i.type = 'BUG'
),

_bugs_percentile as(
  select 
    *,
    percent_rank() over (partition by tag_name order by lead_time_minutes) as percentile
  from _bugs order by 1
),

_avg_bug_age as(
  select 
    tag_name,
    avg(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as average_bug_age
  from _bugs_percentile
  group by 1
),

_80th_bug_age as(
  select 
    tag_name,
    min(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as "80th_bug_age"
  from _bugs_percentile
    where percentile >= 0.8
  group by 1
)

select 
  aba.*,
  eba.80th_bug_age
from 
  _avg_bug_age aba
  join _80th_bug_age eba on aba.tag_name = eba.tag_name

panels.title: 5.3 Average and 80th bug age (day) in the last 10 tags

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the avg bug age in history
with _avg_bug_age as(
  select 
    type,
    avg(lead_time_minutes) as average_bug_age
  from issues
  where 
    type = 'BUG'
    and status = 'DONE'
  group by 1
),


_bug_queue_time as(
  select 
    i.id,
    abg.average_bug_age,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,created_date,NOW()) as queue_time,
    case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,created_date,NOW()) >= average_bug_age then ">=avg_bug_age" else "<avg_bug_age" end as distribution
  from 
    issues i
    left join _avg_bug_age abg on i.type = abg.type
  where
    i.type = 'BUG'
    and status != 'DONE'
)

select
  distribution,
  count(*) as bug_count
from
  _bug_queue_time
group by 1

panels.title: 5.4 Queue time for all backlog bugs

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the 80th perccentile bug age in history
with _bugs_percentile as(
  select 
    id,
    lead_time_minutes,
    percent_rank() over (order by lead_time_minutes) as percentile
  from issues
  where 
    type = 'BUG'
    and status = 'DONE'
)

select 
  min(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as "80th_bug_age"
from 
  _bugs_percentile
where 
  percentile >= 0.8

-- Get the work-type distribution in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 1
),

_dev_eq_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    sum(c.dev_eq) as pr_eloc
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join pull_requests pr on c.sha = pr.merge_commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rcd.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
	group by 1,2
),

_pr_issues as(
  select
    pri.pull_request_id,
    pri.issue_id,
    i.key,
    i.type,
    row_number() over(partition by issue_id ORDER by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    issue_number != 0
),

_final_results as(
  select
    distinct deop.*, pi.type
  from 
    _dev_eq_of_pr deop
    left join _pr_issues pi on deop.pull_request_id = pi.pull_request_id
  where pi.pr_rank = 1
  order by 1
)

SELECT
  tag_name,
  case when type != '' then type else 'UNKNOWN' end as type,
  sum(pr_eloc) as dev_eq
from _final_results
group by 1,2

panels.title: 6.1 Work-type distribution (dev_eq) in the last tag

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the work-type distribution in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 1,1
),

_dev_eq_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    sum(c.dev_eq) as pr_eloc
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join pull_requests pr on c.sha = pr.merge_commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rcd.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
	group by 1,2
),

_pr_issues as(
  select
    pri.pull_request_id,
    pri.issue_id,
    i.key,
    i.type,
    row_number() over(partition by issue_id ORDER by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    issue_number != 0
),

_final_results as(
  select
    distinct deop.*, pi.type
  from 
    _dev_eq_of_pr deop
    left join _pr_issues pi on deop.pull_request_id = pi.pull_request_id
  where pi.pr_rank = 1
  order by 1
)

SELECT
  tag_name,
  case when type != '' then type else 'UNKNOWN' end as type,
  sum(pr_eloc) as dev_eq
from _final_results
group by 1,2

panels.title: 6.2 Work-type distribution (dev_eq) in the tag before last

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the work-type distribution in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 2,1
),

_dev_eq_of_pr as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,'tags/', -1) as tag_name,
    pr.id as pull_request_id,
    sum(c.dev_eq) as pr_eloc
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcd
		left join commits c on rcd.commit_sha = c.sha
		-- left join pull_request_commits prc on c.sha = prc.commit_sha
		left join pull_requests pr on c.sha = pr.merge_commit_sha
	where
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(rcd.new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
		and rcd.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
	group by 1,2
),

_pr_issues as(
  select
    pri.pull_request_id,
    pri.issue_id,
    i.key,
    i.type,
    row_number() over(partition by issue_id ORDER by pr.created_date asc) as pr_rank
  from
    pull_request_issues pri
    left join pull_requests pr on pri.pull_request_id = pr.id
    left join issues i on pri.issue_id = i.id
  where 
    issue_number != 0
),

_final_results as(
  select
    distinct deop.*, pi.type
  from 
    _dev_eq_of_pr deop
    left join _pr_issues pi on deop.pull_request_id = pi.pull_request_id
  where pi.pr_rank = 1
  order by 1
)

SELECT
  tag_name,
  case when type != '' then type else 'UNKNOWN' end as type,
  sum(pr_eloc) as dev_eq
from _final_results
group by 1,2

panels.title: 6.3 Work-type distribution (dev_eq) in the 2nd tag before last

targets.rawSql:
-- Get the bug fixer distribution in the last 10 tags
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
),

_author_eloc as(
  SELECT 
  	c.author_name,
    sum(c.dev_eq) total_dev_eq
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs rcf
    left join commits c on rcf.commit_sha = c.dev_eq
  WHERE
  	rcf.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
  GROUP BY 1
),

_author_eloc_running_total as(
  SELECT 
    *, 
    sum(total_dev_eq) OVER (Order by total_dev_eq desc) AS running_total
  FROM 
    _author_eloc
),

_percentile as(
  SELECT 
    author_name,
    total_dev_eq,
    running_total/sum(total_dev_eq) OVER () AS cumulative_percentage
  FROM 
    _author_eloc_running_total
)


SELECT 
  count(case when cumulative_percentage <= 0.8 then author_name else null end)/count(*) as "contributors who contributed 80% of dev_eq"
FROM _percentile

panels.title: 7.1 % of contributors who contributed 80% of dev_eq in the last 10 tags

targets.rawSql:
with _last_10_tags as(
  SELECT 
    distinct new_ref_name, old_ref_name
  FROM 
    refs_commits_diffs
  WHERE
		SUBSTRING_INDEX(new_ref_name,':', 3) = '$repo_id'
	ORDER BY 1 desc
	LIMIT 10
)


SELECT 
	c.author_name,
  sum(c.dev_eq) total_dev_eq
FROM 
  refs_commits_diffs rcf
  left join commits c on rcf.commit_sha = c.dev_eq
WHERE
	rcf.new_ref_name in (SELECT new_ref_name FROM _last_10_tags)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 desc
limit 15

panels.title: 7.2 Dev Equivalent per commit author (top 15) in last 10 tags

list.definition: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from repos
list.label: Repo
list.name: repo_id
list.query: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from repos
